articles.description: England batter Jonny Bairstow has capped off his tremendous recent run of form by being voted ICC Men's Player of the Month for June 2022.
articles.content: England batter Jonny Bairstow has capped off his tremendous recent run of form by being voted ICC Men's Player of the Month for June 2022.Bairstow defeated England team-mate Joe Root and New Zealand … [+2067 chars]

articles.title: Suryakumar Yadav admits not getting India home will 'keep on playing in my mind' - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Suryakumar Yadav, who scored his maiden international century for India, admitted during a post-match interview that in his mind, he made a calculation error and is disappointed with it.

articles.title: Babar Azam is very young, once he has retired you can sit down and start comparing him with others: Waqar Younis - India Today
articles.description: Pakistan captain Babar Azam has registered 17 centuries in 89 ODI matches at a strike rate of 90.24. Under Babar's captaincy, Pakistan reached the semi-finals of the T20 World Cup 2021.
articles.content:
Former Pakistan cricketer Waqar Younis wants any comparison of Babar Azam with star batters should wait until the current captain finishes his career.

articles.title: Yardsticks seem to have changed: Venkatesh Prasad slams decision to rest out-of-form India cricketers - India Today
articles.description: Former India player Venkatesh Prasad has questioned the treatment of senior India players who have been rested for India’s ODI tour to West Indies. Prasad took to Twitter to express his views about the same.
